name: Fuzzy Dice
description:
Using Your Special Fuzzy Dice, Can You Run From The Cops?

Up Arrow - Accel.

Down Arrow - Reverse

Right Arrow - Turn Right

Left Arrow - Turn Left

Two Fuzzy Dice will mape combinations which will help you or the police.

2 - 2 More Cop Cars will Emerge

3 - 1 More Cop Car Will Emerge

4 - Faster Cop Car

5 - Bigger Cop Car

6 - -1 Point

7 - Reroll

8 - +1 Point

9 - Smaller Car

10 - Faster Car

11 - Smaller and Faster Car

12 - Cop Car Will Stop
